entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
